privacyPolicy.description: label of the privacy policy link

privacyPolicyAcceptanceUsingAWindow1.defaultMessage: We use technologies, such as cookies and local storage, and we process personal data, such as IP addresses to personalize content based on your personal data and preference.

privacyPolicyAcceptanceUsingAWindow2.defaultMessage: It also allows us to measure the performance of the web application.

privacyPolicyAcceptanceUsingAWindow3.defaultMessage: Click below to consent to the use of this technology and the processing of your personal data for these purposes. You can still access the {privatePolicyLink} in the user menu.
